item.title: House Cleaning
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What's Included in a House Cleaning? Here is what you can expect from a house cleaning from a Handy professional. Download the app to share further cleaning details and instructions! No matter what you do in SCleaner, you probably wish you spent less time cleaning. With a professional maid service, you can get help with your kitchen, bathroom, living room, and bedroom cleaning. You’ll have time for more of what you love. And you can always come back to a clean, refreshing home. Bedroom, Living Room & Common Areas
  • Dust all accessible surfaces
  • Wipe down all mirrors and glass fixtures
  • Clean all floor surfaces
  • Take out garbage and recycling
Kitchen Cleaning, Bathroom Cleaning
  • Wash and sanitize the toilet, shower, tub and sink
  • Empty sink and load up dishwasher with dirty dishes
  • Wipe down all mirrors and glass fixtures
  • Take out garbage and recycling
Why Book House Cleaning Services with SCleaner? If you’re in need of home cleaning, apartment cleaning, or a maid service, we’re simply the best, most convenient home cleaning service out there. We know you want the cheapest house cleaning available while still having the confidence that you will receive a cleaner who is thorough and professional, with keen attention to detail. When you sign up for a Handy house cleaning plan, we aim to offer you just that. And SCleaner helps schedule your recurring cleanings automatically for you, so you can focus on the other things in your life. Vetted and background-checked professionals. Backed by the SCleaner Happiness Guarantee. Friendly 24/7 customer service Affordable, upfront pricing Frequently Asked Questions Which Handy professional will come to my place? SCleaner has a vast network of experienced, top-rated cleaners. Based on the time and date of your request, we work to assign the best professional available. Like working with a specific pro? Add them to your Pro Team from the mobile app and they'll be requested first for all future bookings. Can I skip or reschedule bookings? wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Found all four personnel to be courteous, polite and willing, and would recommend the group again if necessary.

The carpets looked so clean after the steam-clean! It is reassuring to me to know that the carpets have been thoroughly cleaned before we move in. Luan was courteous and professional and I appreciated the 30min heads-up text message as to when they would arrive. I will definitely use their services again.

[#2] I booked SCleaner for an NDIS clean and unfortunately they just took advantage of the situation! Initially they turned up an hour early and proceed to till me they work off NSW time when we are not even close to the boarder.... The clean was suppose to last for 2.5h however they finished within 1h10 max.
Unfortunately this is an issue that happens a lot with people taking advantage of this disadvantage as it is often the case they will not speak up! It is extremely poor effort and I could not recommend these guys to anyone!

[#2] The carpets looked so clean after the steam-clean! It is reassuring to me to know that the carpets have been thoroughly cleaned before we move in. Luan was courteous and professional and I appreciated the 30min heads-up text message as to when they would arrive. I will definitely use their services again.

item.excerpt:encoded: The Ocean Cleanup is developing a passive cleanup method, which uses the natural oceanic forces to rapidly and cost-effectively clean up the plastic already in the oceans. With a full fleet of cleanup systems in the Great Pacific Garbage Patch, we aim to clean up 50% of its plastic every five years.

item.title: Clean square and streets after Halloween
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Street Cleaning is important because leaves and organic material on streets get into storm drains. Once in the drainage system, organic material releases phosphorous and nitrogen, polluting the Charles River or Alewife Brook. Furthermore, leaves can block drains, resulting in flooding

item.title: Take care of the garden for the host in london
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: You need to take care when fertilizing plants since too much of any fertilizer can burn roots, reducing their ability to absorb water. This, in turn, makes the plants more susceptible to stress from drought, cold, and heat. Plants starved for nutrients are smaller and can be badly affected by leaf spots, while a stronger plant can fight off diseases. An overabundance of a particular nutrient is another way to put stress on a plant.

item.title: Cleaning The Basement Of Techco Building
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Basements flooded with surface water, seepage through walls, or backflow from sewer lines often suffer little or no structural damage from the water, because the water inside braces the walls against the pressure of outside water and waterlogged soil.

item.title: Post Construction Cleaning
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What's Included in a House Cleaning? Here is what you can expect from a house cleaning from a Handy professional. Download the app to share further cleaning details and instructions! No matter what you do in SCleaner, you probably wish you spent less time cleaning. With a professional maid service, you can get help with your kitchen, bathroom, living room, and bedroom cleaning. You’ll have time for more of what you love. And you can always come back to a clean, refreshing home. Bedroom, Living Room & Common Areas
  • Dust all accessible surfaces
  • Wipe down all mirrors and glass fixtures
  • Clean all floor surfaces
  • Take out garbage and recycling
Kitchen Cleaning, Bathroom Cleaning
  • Wash and sanitize the toilet, shower, tub and sink
  • Empty sink and load up dishwasher with dirty dishes
  • Wipe down all mirrors and glass fixtures
  • Take out garbage and recycling
Why Book House Cleaning Services with SCleaner? If you’re in need of home cleaning, apartment cleaning, or a maid service, we’re simply the best, most convenient home cleaning service out there. We know you want the cheapest house cleaning available while still having the confidence that you will receive a cleaner who is thorough and professional, with keen attention to detail. wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The carpets looked so clean after the steam-clean! It is reassuring to me to know that the carpets have been thoroughly cleaned before we move in. Luan was courteous and professional and I appreciated the 30min heads-up text message as to when they would arrive. I will definitely use their services again

item.title: Commercial Cleaning
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What's Included in a House Cleaning? Here is what you can expect from a house cleaning from a Handy professional. Download the app to share further cleaning details and instructions! No matter what you do in SCleaner, you probably wish you spent less time cleaning. With a professional maid service, you can get help with your kitchen, bathroom, living room, and bedroom cleaning. You’ll have time for more of what you love. And you can always come back to a clean, refreshing home. Bedroom, Living Room & Common Areas
  • Dust all accessible surfaces
  • Wipe down all mirrors and glass fixtures
  • Clean all floor surfaces
  • Take out garbage and recycling
Kitchen Cleaning, Bathroom Cleaning
  • Wash and sanitize the toilet, shower, tub and sink
  • Empty sink and load up dishwasher with dirty dishes
  • Wipe down all mirrors and glass fixtures
  • Take out garbage and recycling
Why Book House Cleaning Services with SCleaner? If you’re in need of home cleaning, apartment cleaning, or a maid service, we’re simply the best, most convenient home cleaning service out there. We know you want the cheapest house cleaning available while still having the confidence that you will receive a cleaner who is thorough and professional, with keen attention to detail. When you sign up for a Handy house cleaning plan, we aim to offer you just that. And SCleaner helps schedule your recurring cleanings automatically for you, so you can focus on the other things in your life. Vetted and background-checked professionals. Backed by the SCleaner Happiness Guarantee. Friendly 24/7 customer service Affordable, upfront pricing Frequently Asked Questions Which Handy professional will come to my place? SCleaner has a vast network of experienced, top-rated cleaners. Based on the time and date of your request, we work to assign the best professional available. Like working with a specific pro? Add them to your Pro Team from the mobile app and they'll be requested first for all future bookings. Can I skip or reschedule bookings? item.content:encoded: I have been with Busy Living Cleaning for a couple of years now and have been very happy. Krystel has become almost like family. She is so caring and works so hard to meet our needs. This is a wonderful company. Laner Elizar Ontario, OR Very professional attention to detail. Our master bath has a shower that is a nightmare to keep clean but our cleaning service as done an outstanding job to keep it clean. Over all we are exceptionally happy and would recommend. item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
choose for youSimple Pricing Plans

Cleanmate comes with cost calculator – a unique tool which allows you to easily create
price estimation forms to give your client idea of the cost of your service.

Basic $50.99 Per Month
  • 1 Bathroom cleaning
  • Up to 3 bedrooms cleaning
  • 1 Livingroom cleaning
  • Small kitchen (0 – 150 ft2)
  • Pets hair removing
  • Up to 2 additional rooms cleaning
Start Cleaning PREMIUM $88.99 Per Month
  • Up to 2 bathrooms cleaning
  • Up to 4 bedrooms cleaning
  • Up to 2 livingrooms cleaning
  • Medium kitchen (151 – 250 ft2)
  • Pets hair removing
  • Up to 5 additional rooms cleaning
Start Cleaning PREMIUM $99.99 Per Month
  • Up to 5 bathrooms cleaning
  • Up to 6 bedrooms cleaning
  • Up to 5 livingrooms cleaning
  • Large kitchen (251 – 550 ft2)
  • Pets hair removing
  • Up to 10 additional rooms cleaning
Start Cleaning Note: The above price is the package price if you want to select each service for your house, please go to the detailed cleaning schedule. Thanks Cost Calculator

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Opened Scleaner Company Since 1996

20 years ago, when we saw a rising demand for house cleaning, we opened a small company of only 10 people, after 20 years of developing Scleaner, we became the leading cleaning service in Canada.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E A Maid Service You Can Rely On

Hiring a maid service can be a challenge considering all of your options. Nearly every house cleaning company is offering you a clean home and competitive rates. So how do you know which maid service is the best option?

The thing that sets a great maid service apart from the competition is accountability. Being accountable means carrying out the job you agreed to do. It means getting direct feedback from you to confirm we did what we said we’d do. When you work with a maid service that actively seeks accountability, you know you’re working with integrity. Unlike other companies, we actually listen and take immediate action.

How You Help Us Deliver Every Time

With your help, we’re able to provide continual and consistent value to every home and business we clean. You do this by responding to our Quality Driven Survey that goes out each time we complete a maid service. Your responses tell us what we did right and where we can improve. Unlike other companies, we actually listen and take immediate action.

Owners and workers often times get too close to their business and forget the most important thing – customer service. At our maid service company, we believe it’s only by listening to you that we can keep improving our maid services.

1 COMPLETED MOVINGS 1 + HAPPY CUSTOMERS 1 COMPLETED PROJECTS 1 PLACES CLEANED I have been with Busy Living Cleaning for a couple of years now and have been very happy. Krystel has become almost like family. She is so caring and works so hard to meet our needs. This is a wonderful company. Laner Elizar Ontario, OR Very professional attention to detail. Our master bath has a shower that is a nightmare to keep clean but our cleaning service as done an outstanding job to keep it clean. Over all we are exceptionally happy Kathleen Mona Ontario, OR I have been with Busy Living Cleaning for a couple of years now and have been very happy. Krystel has become almost like family. She is so caring and works so hard to meet our needs. This is a wonderful company. Laner Elizar Ontario, OR Very professional attention to detail. Our master bath has a shower that is a nightmare to keep clean but our cleaning service as done an outstanding job to keep it clean. Over all we are exceptionally happy Kathleen Mona Ontario, OR easy choiceWhy Choose Us

Aiming to become a leading professional cleaning service provider in New York with the strength of people, management organization and technology, Cleaner Company specializes..

Professional Staff

Our reliable and stable crews understand your specific house and office clearning service needs. SCleaner

Read More Best Service

With the service verified by thousands of customers, we are confident to bring our customers the best service.

Read More 100% Warranty

We keep your home sparkling clean and germ free. Our disinfecting process kills 99% of common bacteria

Read More Fast Service

Just one appointment we will never delay, we will be available anytime. Aliquam interdum dolor. lipsum

Read More How It Works Online Scheduling Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia. Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change desk. Our microfiber cloths, which capture dust and dirt rather . Clean Ctarefully Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia. Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change desk. Our microfiber cloths, which capture dust and dirt rather . Enjoy Cleanliness Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia. Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change desk. Our microfiber cloths, which capture dust and dirt rather . Eco-Friendly Products Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia. Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change desk. Our microfiber cloths, which capture dust and dirt rather . Satisfaction GUARANTEE Request An Free Estimate We Loves the Jobs You HateMeet The Teams

Your happiness is our goal. If you’re not happy, we’ll work to make it right. Our friendly customer service agents are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Maria origiin CEO company Crow battion Worker Cleaning Teresa Phillips Office Administrator Maria origiin CEO company

item.title: Why Choose Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Here's Why SCleaner is the Best Cleaning Service

Here's how it works -- just go to our website or app and tell us your zipcode and how big your house, apartment, or flat is. Handy will then connect you with a top-rated home cleaning services professional to help take the stress out of your life. Price is important. Nobody likes it when they think they’re paying one price for a home cleaning service provider, and then they are informed that the price is actually going to be much higher. With Handy, we let you know up front what you’re going to pay. And with incredibly affordable hourly rates given at a discount to loyal customers who sign up for weekly

Get Started Professional Staff

Our reliable and stable crews understand your specific house and office clearning service needs.

Best Service

With the service verified by thousands of customers, we are confident to bring our customers the best service.

100% Warranty

We keep your home sparkling clean and germ free. Our disinfecting process kills 99% of common bacteria

Fast Service

Just one appointment we will never delay, we will be available anytime. Aliquam interdum dolor.

item.title: Offer

item.content:encoded: Our special offers We always have something on offer. Save even more on our everyday low rates by taking advantage of these amazing offers. But hurry - these offers are for a limited time only! Please check regularly our special offers. Exclusive Offer - Spring Cleaning Service 20% OFF Our spring cleaning service is now 20% cheaper. Regular price is £13 per hour. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers. There is a requirement for minimum of 4 hours per cleaning visit.? Normal Price: $13.00 $9.00 per hour Preferential Price: $13.00 $9.00 per hour Request: Minimum of 4 hours per cleaning visit Expires Date: October 21, 2020 Book Now! Special Offer - Refer a Friend Get Any Our cleaning service 10% OFF Refer a friend to us and receive any our cleaning service 10% off once the friend makes their first booking and we do cleaning service for him. The friend you refer will also receive 10% off to be redeemed against their first booking. Normal Price: $40.00 $25.00 per hour Preferential Price: $40.00 $25.00 per hour Request: Minimum of 4 hours per cleaning visit Expires Date: October 21, 2020 Book Now! Big Discount 50% for all services on National Day Discount 50% for all services on National Day, great promotion unmatched at SCleaner, book now to enjoy preferential 1 no 2. item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
choose for youSimple Pricing Plans

Cleanmate comes with cost calculator – a unique tool which allows you to easily create
price estimation forms to give your client idea of the cost of your service.

Basic $50.99 Per Month
  • 1 Bathroom cleaning
  • Up to 3 bedrooms cleaning
  • 1 Livingroom cleaning
  • Small kitchen (0 – 150 ft2)
  • Pets hair removing
  • Up to 2 additional rooms cleaning
Start Cleaning PREMIUM $88.99 Per Month
  • Up to 2 bathrooms cleaning
  • Up to 4 bedrooms cleaning
  • Up to 2 livingrooms cleaning
  • Medium kitchen (151 – 250 ft2)
  • Pets hair removing
  • Up to 5 additional rooms cleaning
Start Cleaning DIAMOND $99.99 Per Month
  • Up to 5 bathrooms cleaning
  • Up to 6 bedrooms cleaning
  • Up to 5 livingrooms cleaning
  • Large kitchen (251 – 550 ft2)
  • Pets hair removing
  • Up to 10 additional rooms cleaning
Start Cleaning Note: The above price is the package price if you want to select each service for your house, please go to the detailed cleaning schedule. Thanks Cost Calculator Extra Services

With the following additional services, prices may vary by area, home location, and price negotiable when Soapee works directly with you.

Clean The Roof +100$

Book online instantly, and schedule your first cleaning for as early as tomorrow. Get your home cleaned anytime from 7am to 11pm, 7 days a week.

Clean The Septic Tank +150$

All professionals on the SCleaner platform are screened, background checked, and are rated by customers like you to ensure quality.

Clean Inside The Cabinets +30$

Professionals bring supplies and work from a comprehensive checklist that you can tailor to your liking. You can work with the same cleaner every time. SCleaner strives to match you with the right professional for you and your home. We also provide you with a team of professionals to provide backup in case of scheduling conflicts.

Paint To Repair The House ( PRICE DEAL )

Not able to be home during the cleaning? No problem. The SCleaner app allows your to see when your cleaner arrives and check the progress of their cleaning.

Restoring Furniture ( PRICE DEAL )

Book online instantly, and schedule your first cleaning for as early as tomorrow. Get your home cleaned anytime from 7am to 11pm, 7 days a week.

Clean The Ceiling Fan +15$ / PSC

All professionals on the SCleaner platform are screened, background checked, and are rated by customers like you to ensure quality.

Clean The Air Conditioner +25$ / PSC

Professionals bring supplies and work from a comprehensive checklist that you can tailor to your liking. You can work with the same cleaner every time. SCleaner strives to match you with the right professional for you and your home. We also provide you with a team of professionals to provide backup in case of scheduling conflicts.

Clean According To Your Own Requirements (PRICE DEAL)

Not able to be home during the cleaning? No problem. The SCleaner app allows your to see when your cleaner arrives and check the progress of their cleaning.

Get a Free Consultation Fields marked with an * are required

Once in the drainage system, organic material releases... Read More The Utopian Project Clean Up The Ocean For The Youth The Ocean Cleanup is developing a passive cleanup method, which uses the natural oceanic forces to rapidly and cost-effectively clean up the plastic... item.title: Our Team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We Loves the Jobs You HateMeet The Teams

Your happiness is our goal. If you’re not happy, we’ll work to make it right. Our friendly customer service agents are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Maria origiin CEO company Isla Olivia Worker Cleaning Crow battion Worker Cleaning jack Charlie Worker Cleaning Jhonhanson Worker Cleaning Harry george Worker Cleaning Are You a Five Star Pro?

From cleaners to handymen to smart home installers, Handy is always looking for service professionals who are experts in their trade and provide great service to their customers. The best home service professionals use Handy for the great pay and flexible scheduling.

Become A SCleaner

item.title: FAQ's

item.content:encoded:
Which Handy professional will come to my place? SCleaner has a vast network of experienced, top-rated cleaners. Based on the time and date of your request, we work to assign the best professional available. Like working with a specific pro? item.title: What to look for in green cleaning
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
LexisNexis® CounselLink® is known for being in the forefront when it comes to innovation. We’ve made it our focus to listen to the needs of our customers, and one of the ways that we’ve done this is by hosting a series of regional conferences.
In a previous article on our blog we already discussed creating multiple room types to improve the commercial positioning of your hotel. Using your rooms to merchandise your hotel, will result in auto-upselling by guests, we concluded. But there is more to it. It allows you to build up a comprehensive rate grid with a multitude of price points. Having a wide range of room types at our disposal, with a well defined product variation, allows us to reach different buyer (aka potential guest) budget level.
The Power of Reporting
In the early days of revenue management yield managers used to work with price BAR levels. However this practice in the age of dynamic pricing is a bit outdated. It limits you to work only within a predefined set of rates.But what if there is demand to sell your rooms can sell at a higher price? Or what if you need to go lower during distressed periods.We prefer with a fully flexible pricing matrix, which allows for any rate. But you can also decide to use your room categories to capture extra occupancy in a low demand period. You can decide not close your basic room categories, and oversell them to capture extra volume. This way you don’t have to adjust your pricing, and stay-through rates are not up and down for each day of the week.
  • Avoid paying state franchise taxes for the year in which registration forms were submitted
  • Have ample time to sort out other requirements
  • Creating operating agreements, establishing a board of directors
Different states have different rules as to how far in advance they will receive a delayed filing. Usually, the requirement is to file between 30 to 90 days before the desired effective date. So, for business owners wanting an effective date of January 1, 2019, now is an excellent time to check out the rules that apply to them as we’re in that 30- to 90-day window now. Check with your state or contact my team at CorpNet to find out how far in advance you can file.

I learned specifics about college recruiting from the perspective of someone who has done it successfully at different amateur levels. The three A’s he emphasized – Ability, Academics, and Attitude ”
Found all four personnel to be courteous, polite and willing, and would recommend the group again if necessary.

But you can also decide to use your room categories to capture extra occupancy in a low demand period. You can decide not close your basic room categories, and oversell them to capture extra volume. This way you don’t have to adjust your pricing, and stay-through rates are not up and down for each day of the week.
  • Avoid paying state franchise taxes for the year in which registration forms were submitted
  • Have ample time to sort out other requirements
  • Creating operating agreements, establishing a board of directors
Different states have different rules as to how far in advance they will receive a delayed filing. Usually, the requirement is to file between 30 to 90 days before the desired effective date. So, for business owners wanting an effective date of January 1, 2019, now is an excellent time to check out the rules that apply to them as we’re in that 30- to 90-day window now. Check with your state or contact my team at CorpNet to find out how far in advance you can file.
item.excerpt:encoded: One major benefit of a professional carpet cleaning service is that it helps extend the life of your carpet. Over time, dirt, dust, allergens, and other debris accumulate in the carpet and get embedded within the fibers which can eventually cause the fibers to split and deteriorate.

This way you don’t have to adjust your pricing, and stay-through rates are not up and down for each day of the week.
